review: I love it! Very easy to use and totally worth it
author: Tiffany damon

review: It came with minimal directions on the set up process. The product itself is was good.
author: Melanie Land

review: Very easy to navigate and auto set up if you have a prime membership! Only had for a short time but love it so far! I downloaded the free App, and use voice search.
author: Dudabuda

review: Same problem with the fire box, refuses to play HD content in HD
author: Michael

review: The firestick is so easy to use and it has a lot of features I didn't know about
author: Jennifer N "Jen N"

review: Maybe I didn't do enough fine print reading,  but I understood this to be a way to stream movies and different tv shows for free if I was Prime. Apparently the apps are free, but require a subscription to view the movies. It's the same thing our Xbox and Kindles do. Just disappointed with myself for missing that tidbit of info.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It loses one star for cutting out every now and then.  The good news is that it resumes after a second or two without losing anything.  I especially appreciate being able to see all of my photo's and videos that I have taken on my Fire phone.  They go automatically to the cloud and are easily found and played using the Fire Stick.
author: Stuberg

review: Wish I would have gotten when Oromo came out, great item, ditching time warner asap!
author: Margaret Bond

review: It did exactly what the description said. It was amazingly simple to set up and is very easy to use. I am having so much fun exploring all the options.
author: J. Hogan "J9"
